feed.title: Heavy Hitters
feed.subtitle: Heavy Hitters, hosted by Dean Gutic, is your one-stop shop for all things contact sports. Every week, Dean will be discussing the likes of college football, hockey, and UFC fighting. Be sure to tune in weekly for all the heavy hits and harder takes!

entry.title: College Football Week 4 Recap/Week 5 Preview, NHL Metropolitan Division Predictions, Heaviest Hit of the Week - Season 1 Episode 4

link.title: College Football Week 4 Recap/Week 5 Preview, NHL Metropolitan Division Predictions, Heaviest Hit of the Week - Season 1 Episode 4

entry.content:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean gives us a recap of Week 4 and a preview of what to watch in Week 5 of the college football season. After that Dean gives us his NHL Metropolitan Division predictions. Finally, the episode ends with Dean giving us his heaviest hit of the week.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
entry.summary: This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean gives us a recap of Week 4 and a preview of what to watch in Week 5 of the college football season. After that Dean gives us his NHL Metropolitan Division predictions. Finally, the episode ends with Dean giving us his heaviest hit of the week.

entry.title: College Football Recap/Preview, NHL Segment Debut, Heaviest Slam Of the Week - Season 1 Episode 3

link.title: College Football Recap/Preview, NHL Segment Debut, Heaviest Slam Of the Week - Season 1 Episode 3

entry.content:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean gives us a recap of what happened in week 3 along with an update of the AP Poll and a preview for what’s to come for week 4. After that, Dean gives us part 1 of his NHL predictions along with his reaction to the Nathan Mackinnon news. Finally, Dean gives us his signature heaviest hit of the week, but for this week it’s slam.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

entry.title: Chaos in College Football, UFC 279 Recap, Heaviest Hit of the Week - Season 1 Episode 2

link.title: Chaos in College Football, UFC 279 Recap, Heaviest Hit of the Week - Season 1 Episode 2

entry.content:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean gives us a recap of the notable upsets that occurred in week 2 of the college football season, along with an update of the AP Poll and a preview for what’s to come in week 3. After that, Dean recaps UFC 279 that featured a massive shake up leading up to the pay per view. Finally, Dean gives us his signature heaviest hit of the week.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

After that, Dean recaps UFC 279 that featured a massive shake up leading up to the pay per view. Finally, Dean gives us his signature heaviest hit of the week.

entry.title: College Football Week 1 Recap, UFC 279 Predictions, Heaviest Hit of the Week - Season 1 Episode 1

link.title: College Football Week 1 Recap, UFC 279 Predictions, Heaviest Hit of the Week - Season 1 Episode 1

entry.content:
In the debut episode of Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us a recap of all of the games that took place week 1 of the new college football season and gives us an update on the AP poll and a preview of what’s to come in week 2. After that, Dean gives his prediction of what he thinks will happen in the main event of UFC 279 between Nate Diaz and Khamzat Chimaev. The episode ends with Dean giving us his heaviest hitter for his heaviest hit of the week, a signature segment on the show.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Introducing Heavy Hitters - Season 1 Episode 0
entry.content:
Heavy Hitters, hosted by Dean Gutic, is your one-stop shop for all things contact sports. Every week, Dean will be discussing the likes of college football, hockey, and UFC fighting. Be sure to tune in weekly for all the heavy hits and harder takes!
